item.description:
Whether you are a beginning or advanced Enneagram student, we'll take it the the level you want and balance the varying needs. You'll learn your type, if a beginning student and subtypes if advanced. We'll touch on growth and relationship dynamics. April Fool's pranks are welcome! Great macrobiotic dinner served from 7 to 8:30pm for an additional $20. I highly recommend it. Every Fri nite there is a dinner by Chef David Snieckus.

 

HerbPearce, M.Ed, is a relationship coach, therapist and phone coach for personal growth and relationship issues. He's a personality types expert, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living.

781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

8:30-10pm workshop, optional dinner 7 to 8:30pm

781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com
item.why: The Enneagram is fabulous and you want to learn the system.
item.name: Enneagram Workshop
